man.name: startScript
man.long-name: The 2 first bits of flags are used: bit 0 mean freeze resistant, and bit 1
man.description: The 2 first bits of flags are used: bit 0 mean freeze resistant, and bit 1 recursive. Freeze resistant mean that the script won't be freezed by "normal" freezeUnfreeze() calls. If recursive is not set, then any running instance of the script is stopped before the script is started.
